translations: v．穿孔，打孔：在某物上制作一个或多个小孔。
· The machine perforates the paper to make it easier to tear.
这台机器在纸上打孔，以便更容易撕开。

sentences.sentence: An ulcer perforates the duodenal wall.
sentences.translation: 溃疡使十二指肠壁穿孔。

sentences.sentence: Once the toxin perforates the host membrane, ions begin to leak out of the cell.
sentences.translation: 一旦毒素穿孔于宿主细胞膜，离子便开始从细胞中泄漏出去。

sentences.sentence: The most common surgical treatment in use today perforates the wall of the eye, often resulting in collapse of the eyeball, infection, cataract formation and other complications.
sentences.translation: 当今最常见的外科治疗是在眼球壁上打孔，这通常会导致眼球塌陷、感染、形成白内障及其他并发症。
